body:
@carlosantoniodasilva there are some problems with builds, but not connected with my changes:

  * https://travis-ci.org/rails/rails/jobs/8515941
  * https://travis-ci.org/rails/rails/jobs/8519877

```bash
$ gem install bundler
ERROR:  Could not find a valid gem 'bundler' (>= 0), here is why:
          Unable to download data from https://rubygems.org/ - Errno::ETIMEDOUT: Connection timed out - connect(2) (https://rubygems.org/latest_specs.4.8.gz)
ERROR:  Possible alternatives: bundler
The command "gem install bundler" failed and exited with 2 during before_install.
Your build has been stopped.
```
